threat: If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking the program.
If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this to cause a denial of service via application crash.

If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this to cause a denial of service via application crash or execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking the program.
